page.title: 14LYDFORD YOUTH CLUB
page.content: In Lydford we have a Youth Club and no one under seven can go and Mrs Warnett organises the Youth Club.All the Youth Clubs around this area compete in a competition called The Brian Westlake Competition and there are lots of different games called Football,Badminton,Netball and Volleyball.At the Youth Club there is a Pool Table and Badminton Court and we can also play Chess,Volleyball,Soft Ball Football and Upper Deck Lower Deck.In winter Youth Club is held at the Nicholls Hall and in the Summer we have it at the Sports Field.At the Youth Club there are refreshments such as Chocolate Bars and Fizzy Drinks. In the Brian Westlake competition there is a cup for the best Youth Club and in our own seperate Youth Club we have a cup for the best boy and the best girl.
